laboratory_examinations.findings: Negative for nasopharyngeal swab samples on day 3 and day 4; positive for Bronchoalveolar lavage (BAL) on day 6.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Initial nasopharyngeal swab was negative for DFA; BAL specimen on day 6 was positive.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Positive for BAL on day 6; negative for nasopharyngeal swab on day 3 and day 4; negative for endotracheal aspirate on day 8.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Nasopharyngeal swab specimens were negative throughout; BAL was the only source with positive culture on day 6.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Positive for nasopharyngeal swab on day 3; positive for BAL on day 6; confirmed 2009 A(H1N1) virus.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Initial nasopharyngeal specimen on day 3 was positive but subsequent tests were negative; consistently positive results for BAL until day 25.
